name: Bottle Smash Ultimate
description:
Bottle Smash Ultimate is the last word in smashing all kinds of bottles using your computer! Just click play and let the smashing begin!

Click the bottles to smash them! The more bottles you smash the faster the game gets, and the more themes you unlock! There are seven in total:

• Submerged
• Soft drink
• Orange juice
• Spring
• Coffee
• Space
• Fireworks

Featuring:

• 7 Unique themes!
• 10 different types of bottles!
• Support for over 7 different languages!
• Funny, fast and fancy gameplay!

So what are you waiting for?!

Contact:

If you need help with something, you can send us an e-mail: E-mail us

You can also join us on Discord for full support at any time you want, along with opportunities to play closed betas,  participate in events and to have fun with our community!
